Attribute
Type
Description


type
integer; optional
Type ID of the element supported by the publisher. The publisher can display this information in an appropriate format.  See Data Asset Typestable for commonly used examples.

len
integer; optional
Maximum length of the text in the elementâ€™s response.

value
string; required
The formatted string of data to be displayed. 
ext
object; optional
This object is a placeholder that may contain custom JSON agreed to by the parties to support flexibility beyond the standard defined in this specification
